raw: * A line tag is used to display a horizontal line in the browser to allow for a grouped and thereby tidy display of
* elements on one page. To specify the width of the line an optional <layout/>-child can be added.
*   <caption>A line tag which uses 50% of the screen size (6 of 12 available columns)</caption>

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A line tag is used to display a horizontal line in the browser to allow for a grouped and thereby tidy display of elements on one page. To specify the width of the line an optional <layout/>-child can be added.

@widgetexample.name: @widgetexample
@widgetexample.body:
<settings selector="hr">
   <caption>A line tag which uses 50% of the screen size (6 of 12 available columns)</caption>
 </settings>
 <line><layout colspan="6"/></line>
